attributes.action: seriously consider petitions which have more than one million signatures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I beleive that goverment has a duty to listen to the people over issues that concern them but would not like to see laws which may not be supported by the majority being forced through by a relatively few vocal people and so would only support petitions being taken into account by goverment as an expression of the views of the petitioners.It would be a foolish goverment who totaly disregarded a petition signed by millions, but it would be ralativey easy for fanatics to get together a few thousand to support a caused that the majority would oppose.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
